original: intros m n. split. - intro H. apply Nat.le_trans with (p := S (S m)). + apply Nat.le_wd. * reflexivity. * apply le_S in H. apply Nat.le_succ_l. apply H. + apply Nat.le_S. apply Nat.le_wd. * reflexivity. * apply Nat.le_succ_r. apply Nat.le_wd. ++ reflexivity. ++ apply H. - intro H. apply Nat.le_pred_le_succ. apply Nat.le_trans with (p := S m). + apply Nat.le_succ_r. apply Nat.le_wd. * reflexivity. * apply H. + apply Nat.le_pred_le_succ. apply Nat.le_wd. * reflexivity. * apply H.
